meta.title: getConfigurableFields - Catalog - API Reference
meta.description:
Gets an array of ConfigurableField objects.

Request Parameters

Responses

Send a Test Request

product_id.description: The ID of the `Product` to which the resource belongs.

include_fields.description: Fields to include, in a comma-separated list. The ID and the specified fields will be returned.

exclude_fields.description: Fields to exclude, in a comma-separated list. The specified fields will be excluded from a response. The ID cannot be excluded.

page.description: Specifies the page number in a limited (paginated) list of products.

limit.description: Controls the number of items per page in a limited (paginated) list of products.

blocks.data: An array of `ConfigurableField` objects and metadata.

data.description: Response payload for the BigCommerce configurable fields API.

items.description: A configurable field, which is a means of collecting information from a shopper about how they'd like their product configured. This information is then stored alongside the product when added to cart and is reference-able on the order for fulfillment purposes. NOTE: Configurable fields are deprecated, as their complete set of functionality is available via Product Options. They may be removed in a future release.

name.description: The name for the configurable field. Will display on the storefront and can be used as a reference point in the Orders API.

type.description: The type of the configurable field, which determines what sort of information the field is intended to collect on the storefront. Supported types in include a text input, a multi-line textarea, a checkbox, a file upload, and a dropdown selection.

file_allowed_types.description: For fields of "file" type, this controls the allowed file types for upload.

file_max_size.description: For fields of "file" type, this controls the maximum file size. The platform has a maximum file size of 512MB for all uploads regardless of this setting.

select_options.description: For fields of "select" type, this is an array of the options which should be presented in the dropdown.

required.description: Controls whether the field is required to have some input before a product may be added to cart.

sort_order.description: Controls the sort order of this field relative to other configurable fields on the product, for purposes of ordering them on the storefront.

id.description: The unique numeric ID of the configurable field; increments sequentially.

meta.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.

pagination.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.

total.description: Total number of items in the result set.

count.description: Total number of items in the collection response.

per_page.description: The amount of items returned in the collection per page, controlled by the limit parameter.

current_page.description: The page you are currently on within the collection.

total_pages.description: The total number of pages in the collection.

links.description: Pagination links for the previous and next parts of the whole collection.

previous.description: Link to the previous page returned in the response.

current.description: Link to the current page returned in the response.

next.description: Link to the next page returned in the response.
